official-title.#text: Making continuing appropriations for National Park Service operations, the Smithsonian Institution, the National Gallery of Art, and the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes, namely:

text.#text: That the following sums are hereby appropriated, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, and out of applicable corporate or other revenues, receipts, and funds, for

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}prop.#text: for continuing projects or activities (including the costs of direct loans and loan guarantees) that are not otherwise specifically provided for in this joint resolution, that were conducted in fiscal year 2013, and for which appropriations, funds, or other authority were made available by such Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}fund.#tail: , at a rate for operations as provided in the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}fund.#text: Such amounts as may be necessary

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and under the authority and conditions provided in such Act,

quote.#text: Department of the Interior—National Park Service—Operation of the National Park System
United States Holocaust Memorial Museum—Holocaust Memorial Museum

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for each account shall be calculated to reflect the full amount of any reduction required in fiscal year 2013 pursuant to—
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Park Service Operations, Smithsonian Institution, National Gallery of Art, and United States Holocaust Memorial Museum Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101/ss:a

text.#text: The rate for operations provided by

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: division G of the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013/d:G

text.#text: the Presidential sequestration order dated March 1, 2013, except as attributable to budget authority made available by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall be available to the extent and in the manner that would be provided by the pertinent appropriations Act.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Park Service Operations, Smithsonian Institution, National Gallery of Art, and United States Holocaust Memorial Museum Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101

text.#text: Unless otherwise provided for in this joint resolution or in the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2014, appropriations and funds made available and authority granted pursuant to this joint resolution shall be available until whichever of the following first occurs:
the enactment into law of an appropriation for any project or activity provided for in this joint resolution;
the enactment into law of the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2014 without any provision for such project or activity; or

Expenditures made pursuant to this joint resolution shall be charged to the applicable appropriation, fund, or authorization whenever a bill in which such applicable appropriation, fund, or authorization is contained is enacted into law.

This joint resolution shall be implemented so that only the most limited funding action of that permitted in the joint resolution shall be taken in order to provide for continuation of projects and activities.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for civilian personnel compensation and benefits in each department and agency may be apportioned up to the rate for operations necessary to avoid furloughs within such department or agency, consistent with the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2013, except that such authority provided under this section shall not be used until after the department or agency has taken all necessary actions to reduce or defer non-personnel-related administrative expenses.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Park Service Operations, Smithsonian Institution, National Gallery of Art, and United States Holocaust Memorial Museum Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101

quote.#text: Open Our National Parks and Museums Act

text.#text: It is the sense of Congress that this joint resolution may also be referred to as the

short-title.#text: National Park Service Operations, Smithsonian Institution, National Gallery of Art, and United States Holocaust Memorial Museum Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014

text.#text: This joint resolution may be cited as the

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives October 2, 2013.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HJ 70 EH: National Park Service Operations, Smithsonian Institution, National Gallery of Art, and United States Holocaust Memorial Museum Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014
